name: Good Morning (itch) (Seiruzan)
description:
WEEK 3 OF MY GAME A WEEK ASSIGNMENT!

This week's theme was "Ritual", by far the hardest and most vague theme so far. Because of this I didn't end up starting work until halfway through the week so really I wasted half my week thinking about what ritual could even be in game form.

However, this is still my favorite game a week game so far. I really love the atmosphere in this one, however I can see that there is almost no replay value here. This game is the complete opposite of my first week's game in terms of pacing and atmosphere. 

Help your character get ready for work by performing their morning ritual in any order you want! This game is best enjoyed with headphones (i think).
